text: Sočica (, ) is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Vršac municipality, in the South Banat District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Romanian ethnic majority (93.52%) and its population numbering 124 people (2011 census). ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Serbian Banat Category:Populated places in South Banat District Category:Vršac Category:Romanian communities in Serbia
title: Sočica
